verses.verse: It happened, <S%H120><s%> when men began <S%H2490><s%> to multiply <S%H7231><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the surface <S%H6440><s%> of the ground, <S%H127><s%> and daughters <S%H1323><s%> were born to them, <S%H3205><s%>

that God <S%H1121><s%>'s sons saw <S%H7200><s%> that men <S%H120><s%>'s daughters <S%H1323><s%> were beautiful, <S%H2896><s%> and they <S%H2007><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> for themselves wives <S%H802><s%> of all that they chose. <S%H977><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "My Spirit <S%H7307><s%> will not strive <S%H1777><s%> with man <S%H120><s%> forever, <S%H5769><s%> because he also <S%H1571><s%> is flesh; <S%H1320><s%> yet will his days <S%H3117><s%> be one hundred <S%H3967><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>"

The Nephilim <S%H5303><s%> were in the earth <S%H776><s%> in those days, <S%H3117><s%> and also after <S%H310><s%> that, <S%H3651><s%> when <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%>'s sons <S%H1121><s%> came in <S%H935><s%> to men <S%H120><s%>'s daughters. <S%H1323><s%> They bore <S%H3205><s%> children to them. <S%H1992><s%> Those were the mighty men <S%H1368><s%> who were of old, <S%H5769><s%> men <S%H582><s%> of renown. <S%H8034><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that the wickedness <S%H7451><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> was great <S%H7227><s%> in the earth, <S%H776><s%> and that every imagination <S%H3336><s%> of the thoughts <S%H4284><s%> of his heart <S%H3820><s%> was only <S%H7535><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> continually. <S%H3117><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was sorry <S%H5162><s%> that he had made <S%H6213><s%> man <S%H120><s%> on the earth, <S%H776><s%> and it grieved <S%H6087><s%> him in <S%H413><s%> his heart. <S%H3820><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "I will destroy <S%H4229><s%> man <S%H120><s%> whom I have created <S%H1254><s%> from the surface <S%H6440><s%> of the ground; <S%H127><s%> man, <S%H120><s%> along <S%H5704><s%> with animals, <S%H929><s%> creeping things, <S%H7431><s%> and birds <S%H5775><s%> of the sky; <S%H8064><s%> for I am sorry <S%H5162><s%> that I have made them. <S%H6213><s%>"
But Noah <S%H5146><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

This is the history of the generations <S%H8435><s%> of Noah. <S%H5146><s%> Noah <S%H5146><s%> was a righteous <S%H6662><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> blameless <S%H8549><s%> among the people <S%H1755><s%> of his time. <S%H5146><s%> Noah walked <S%H1980><s%> with God. <S%H430><s%>
Noah <S%H5146><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of three <S%H7969><s%> sons: <S%H1121><s%> Shem, <S%H8035><s%> Ham, <S%H2526><s%> and Japheth. <S%H3315><s%>
The earth <S%H776><s%> was corrupt <S%H7843><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> and the earth <S%H776><s%> was filled <S%H4390><s%> with violence. <S%H2555><s%>

God <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> and saw that it was corrupt, <S%H7843><s%> for all flesh <S%H1320><s%> had corrupted <S%H7843><s%> their way <S%H1870><s%> on the earth. <S%H776><s%>

God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Noah, <S%H5146><s%> "The end <S%H7093><s%> of all flesh <S%H1320><s%> has come <S%H935><s%> before me, <S%H6440><s%> for the earth <S%H776><s%> is filled with <S%H4390><s%> violence <S%H2555><s%> through them. <S%H6440><s%> Behold, <S%H7843><s%> I will destroy them with <S%H854><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

Make a ship of gopher wood. <S%H6213><s%> You shall make <S%H753><s%> rooms in the <S%H8392><s%> ship, <S%H7969><s%> and shall seal <S%H3967><s%> it inside and <S%H7341><s%> outside with pitch. <S%H520><s%>

This is how you shall make <S%H6213><s%> it. <S%H753><s%> The length of the ship <S%H8392><s%> will be three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> its breadth <S%H7341><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and its height <S%H6967><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> cubits. <S%H520><s%>

You shall make <S%H6213><s%> a roof <S%H6672><s%> in the ship, <S%H8392><s%> and you shall finish <S%H3615><s%> it to a cubit <S%H520><s%> upward. <S%H4605><s%> You shall set <S%H7760><s%> the door <S%H6607><s%> of the ship <S%H8392><s%> in its side. <S%H6654><s%> You shall make <S%H6213><s%> it with lower, <S%H8482><s%> second, <S%H8145><s%> and third levels. <S%H7992><s%>

I, <S%H2009><s%> even I, <S%H589><s%> do bring <S%H935><s%> the flood <S%H3999><s%> of waters <S%H4325><s%> on this earth, <S%H776><s%> to destroy <S%H7843><s%> all flesh <S%H1320><s%> having the breath <S%H7307><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%> from under <S%H8478><s%> the sky. <S%H8064><s%> Everything <S%H3605><s%> that is in the earth <S%H776><s%> will die. <S%H1478><s%>

But I will establish <S%H6965><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with you. <S%H935><s%> You shall come into <S%H413><s%> the ship, <S%H8392><s%> you, <S%H859><s%> your sons, <S%H1121><s%> your wife, <S%H802><s%> and your sons <S%H1121><s%>' wives with you. <S%H802><s%>

Of every living thing <S%H2416><s%> of all flesh, <S%H1320><s%> you shall bring <S%H935><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> of every sort into the ship, <S%H8392><s%> to keep them alive <S%H2421><s%> with you. <S%H2145><s%> They shall be male and female. <S%H5347><s%>

Of the birds <S%H5775><s%> after their kind, <S%H4327><s%> of the livestock <S%H929><s%> after their kind, <S%H4327><s%> of every creeping thing <S%H7431><s%> of the ground <S%H127><s%> after its kind, <S%H4327><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> of every sort shall come <S%H935><s%> to you, <S%H2421><s%> to keep them alive.
Take <S%H3947><s%> with you of all food <S%H3978><s%> that is eaten, <S%H398><s%> and gather <S%H622><s%> it to yourself; <S%H402><s%> and it will be for food for you, and for them."
Thus Noah <S%H5146><s%> did. <S%H6213><s%> According to all that God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> him, <S%H6213><s%> so he did.
